first go to your virtual drive (deamon tools, ect...) then mount the iso file to one of the free drives. remember that before you do that extract the iso from the rar. then when the iso auto runs click install after you do that it will eventually ask for a cd key when that happens you need to open up my computer and go to the drive the cd is mounted on and right click it till you see the explore button click that then go to the file on the cd that says razor1911 and click on keygen then use that key and finish...enjoy

crack is in the 1911 folder which is located on the disk. to get to it you have to mount the iso then open up my computer then you right click were the game is mounted and click "explore" you should see a folder called razor or 1911 or something then you open up that folder and the crack should be there or something like that. or there will be a folder labeled "crack" on the disk also, anyway you have to copy the crack to the folder called bin32 i think or bin something and replace the game .exe with the crack and play using the cracked icon
